name: skipper-gcs
description: A skipper adapter to allow uploading files to Google Cloud Storage

scripts.test: node -e "require('skipper-adapter-tests')({mocha: { timeout: 360000 }, module: require('./'), bucket:process.env.BUCKET || 'skipper-adapter-tests', projectId: process.env.PROJECTID, keyFilename: process.env.KEYFILENAME, email: process.env.EMAIL});"

author: Ian Wu <onlinemad@gmail.com>
